Description: Rim sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at top of rim, glazed streaky black below; exterior: reserved (slip very worn) save for chequer and dot band around rim and thin line below; inscription on exterior (very worn).
Curator's comments: For parallels regarding the rim pattern, see British Museum 1886,0401.474. The sherd belongs to the same vase as British Museum 1886,0401.1551.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1101) (phase 2)
